mapper.sql: id, paper_num, name, notice, total_score, total_time, study_section_id, grade_level_id, address_province, term, paper_type, exam_type, question_type, create_id, create_date, update_id, update_date, enable_flag,cms_id,paper_province
mapper.insert:
insert into xl_paper
id,
paper_num,
name,
notice,
total_score,
total_time,
study_section_id,
grade_level_id,
address_province,
term,
paper_type,
exam_type,
question_type,
create_id,
create_date,
update_id,
update_date,
enable_flag,
cms_id,
paper_province,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{paperNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{studySectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gradeLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update xl_paper
paper_num = #{paperNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_score = #{totalScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
total_time = #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
study_section_id = #{studySectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grade_level_id = #{gradeLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address_province = #{addressProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER},
term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paper_type = #{paperType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exam_type = #{examType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question_type = #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enable_flag = #{enableFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cms_id = #{cmsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
paper_province = #{paperProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update xl_paper
paper_num = #{paperNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_score = #{totalScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
total_time = #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
study_section_id = #{studySectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grade_level_id = #{gradeLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address_province = #{addressProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER},
term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paper_type = #{paperType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exam_type = #{examType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question_type = #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enable_flag = #{enableFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paper_province = #{paperProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cms_id = #{cmsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id paperId, ps.id paperSubjectId, ps.subject_num subjectNum, ps.`subject` `subject`, psd.id paperSubjectDetailId, ps.audio, ps.type type, psd.guide, psd.question, psd.guide_audio guideAudio, psd.read_time readTime, psd.question_audio questionAudio, psd.write_time writeTime, psd.score, po.result, po.correct_result correntResult, psd.repeat_count repeatCount, psd.type detailType, ess.id essId FROM xl_paper p LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject ps ON ps.paper_id = p.id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject_detail psd ON ps.id = psd.subject_id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_option po ON psd.id = po.detail_id left JOIN xl_exam_student_score ess ON ess.student_id = #{studentId} and ess.exam_id = #{examId} and ess.subject_detail_id = psd.id WHERE p.id = #{paperId} order by ps.id,psd.id

SELECT p.id paperId, ps.id paperSubjectId, ps.subject_num subjectNum, ps.`subject` `subject`, psd.id paperSubjectDetailId, ps.audio, ps.type type, psd.guide, psd.question, psd.guide_audio guideAudio, psd.read_time readTime, psd.question_audio questionAudio, psd.write_time writeTime, psd.score, po.result, po.correct_result correntResult, psd.repeat_count repeatCount, psd.type detailType FROM xl_paper p LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject ps ON ps.paper_id = p.id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject_detail psd ON ps.id = psd.subject_id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_option po ON psd.id = po.detail_id WHERE p.id = #{value} order by ps.id,psd.id

SELECT p.id paperId, ps.id paperSubjectId, ps.subject_num subjectNum, ps.`subject` `subject`, psd.id paperSubjectDetailId, ps.audio, ps.type type, psd.guide, psd.question, psd.guide_audio guideAudio, psd.read_time readTime, psd.question_audio questionAudio, psd.write_time writeTime, psd.score, psd.original_text originalText, po.result, po.point_result pointResult, po.correct_result correntResult, psd.repeat_count repeatCount, psd.type detailType FROM xl_paper p LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject ps ON ps.paper_id = p.id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject_detail psd ON ps.id = psd.subject_id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_option po ON psd.id = po.detail_id WHERE p.id = #{value} order by ps.id,psd.id

SELECT p.id paperId, ps.id paperSubjectId, ps.subject_num subjectNum, ps.`subject` `subject`, psd.id paperSubjectDetailId, ps.audio, ps.type type, psd.guide, psd.question, psd.guide_audio guideAudio, psd.read_time readTime, psd.question_audio questionAudio, psd.write_time writeTime, psd.score, po.result, po.correct_result correntResult, psd.repeat_count repeatCount, psd.type detailType, ess.id essId, ess.text studentResult, ess.audio_path studentAudio, psd.original_text originalText, po.point_result pointResult, ess.score studentScore, ess.integrity, ess.fluency, ess.pronunciation FROM xl_paper p LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject ps ON ps.paper_id = p.id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject_detail psd ON ps.id = psd.subject_id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_option po ON psd.id = po.detail_id left JOIN xl_exam_student_score ess ON ess.student_id = #{studentId} and ess.exam_id = #{examId} and ess.subject_detail_id = psd.id WHERE p.id = #{paperId} order by ps.id,psd.id
